properties.areaDesc: Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 4:18AM AKST until February 19 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph near White Pass.

* WHERE...Haines Highway west of the Chilkat River Bridge and the
Klondike Highway above 1000 feet.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy, wet snow will
be difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to change to rain
near sea level, but a period of heavy snowfall is expected along
both highways this evening and overnight.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY
